solution_line_template: That means he gets {plantation_area_sq_feet}*{grams_peanuts_per_sq_foot}=<<{plantation_area_sq_feet}*{grams_peanuts_per_sq_foot}={total_grams_peanuts}>>{total_grams_peanuts} grams of peanuts

So he makes {total_grams_peanuts}*{grams_pb_from_peanuts}/{grams_peanuts_for_pb}=<<{total_grams_peanuts}*{grams_pb_from_peanuts}/{grams_peanuts_for_pb}={total_grams_peanut_butter}>>{total_grams_peanut_butter} grams of peanut butter
So he has {total_grams_peanut_butter}/{grams_per_kg}=<<{total_grams_peanut_butter}/{grams_per_kg}={total_kg_peanut_butter}>>{total_kg_peanut_butter} kg of peanut butter
